import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; /** * Header Component * * Displays the main navigation and branding for Ebis Treasure. * This component is designed to be easily customizable for future updates. * * Future enhancements: * - Add navigation menu items * - Add search functionality * - Add user account links * - Add shopping cart icon (when cart functionality is implemented) */ const Header = () => { return (
{/* Main Logo/Brand */}

Ebis Treasure

Where Imagination Meets Learning

{/* Navigation Menu - Currently static, can be made dynamic */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
); }; export default Header;
